column2: group_by(`林管處`,`工作站`,`樣區名稱`,`樣區編號`,`旅次`,`備註`) %>%
reshape2::dcast(林管處+工作站+樣區名稱+樣區編號 ~ 旅次, value = NN) %>%
write_xlsx(here("Report of Foresty_20221024/因故未調查樣區.xlsx"))
`summarise()` has grouped output by '林管處', '工作站', '樣區名稱', '樣區編號', '旅次'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
Using NN as value column: use value.var to override.
